credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Temple of Vengeance
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Horizontal rectangle; interior of temple in circular form dome supported by columns and decorated with sculptural centerpiece, griffons in front and statues between the columns.
name: Drawing
